Name: 49er
Responses: Feeling better?  You were pretty drunk last night.
The camp looked like this when we got back yesterday.
Try retracing your steps, maybe you just left the bag somewhere.
You were at the saloon, and didn't get back here until nearly sun-up.
Uh huh.

Name: Blacksmith
Responses: Ugh, my head hurts, and I really don't want to be here today.
I am really tired of that guy.
One day he'll get his.
Damn Sherriff.

Name: Shop keeper
Responses: Howdy!  Come back for more supplies today?
You didn't have quite enough money for everything yesterday.
Why don't you wait until after the Sherriff stops by.
Have a look around.

Name: Assayer
Responses: Back to trade out the rest of your gold?
You didn't trade it all yesterday, the bag was still half full.
I see.  Sorry, I can't help with that.

Name: Barkeep
Responses: In for some hair of the dog?
You got pretty far into your cups last night.
Was just you for a while.
About 10, Smithy joined you.
I had to kick you out at closing.
Ready for another?

Name: Sherriff
Responses: Yep
Nope

Name: Teller
Responses: Deposit or withdrawal?
I can only do a deposit or withdrawal.
